call_summary.final_outcome: The receptionist attempted to transfer the caller to a specific staff member, but after a hold period, informed the caller that the staff member and their assistant were unavailable. The receptionist then took a message and recorded the caller's email address.

transfer_context.description: The receptionist placed the caller on hold to attempt a transfer to the requested staff member, but returned to the line when the staff member was found to be unavailable.
